mapper.select: select email, password, mname, gender, phone, photo, ctno, date_format(regdate,'%Y-%m-%d')regdate from member
mapper.insert: insert into member(email, password, mname, gender, phone, photo, ctno) values(#{email}, #{password}, #{mname}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{photo}, #{ctno})
INSERT INTO guider (email, introdution, quote, field, lang, currentjob, dept) VALUES (#{email}, #{introdution}, #{quote}, #{field}, #{lang}, #{currentjob}, #{dept});
mapper.select: SELECT email, password, mname FROM member WHERE email=#{email}

select m.EMAIL, m.MNAME, m.PASSWORD, m.GENDER, m.PHONE, m.PHOTO, m.CTNO, m.regdate, g.currentjob, g.dept, g.INTRODUTION, g.QUOTE, g.FIELD, g.LANG from member m join guider g on m.email = g.email where m.email = #{email}

SELECT m.email, m.mname, m.gender, m.phone, m.photo, m.ctno, m.regdate
, g.introdution, g.quote, g.field, g.lang, g.currentjob, g.dept
from member m
join guider g on m.email = g.email
WHERE m.email = #{email}
select auth from member_auth where email = #{email}

SELECT m.email, m.mname, m.gender, m.phone, m.photo, m.ctno, m.regdate, g.introdution, g.quote, g.field, g.lang, g.currentjob, g.dept
, f.fno
FROM member m INNER JOIN guider g ON m.email = g.email
LEFT JOIN follower f ON f.follow = #{email} and f.guider = g.email
ORDER BY m.regdate limit #{page}, 16
SELECT count(fno) FROM follower WHERE guider = #{guider} AND follow = #{follower};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM follower WHERE guider = #{guider} AND follow = #{follower}
